product_id.description: The Canopy-generated ID for the product.

name.description: Name of Product, i.e. Express Card.

created_at.description: The `Date-Time` that this product was created on the server.

status.description: The status of a Product (i.e. `live` or `draft`). Products with the `draft` status require additional policy configurations to launch.

policies.description: An object of policies that drive product behavior.

offer_id.description: A canopy-generated unique ID for this offer

offer_term.description: The term duration of this offer in months

offer_disclosure.example: Subject to credit approval. fixed APR of 7.99% - 16.99% based on creditworthiness for 60 months.  For each $1,000 financed, 36 amortized payments of $18.75 - $22.52

offers.description: For installment loans, the set of offers accessible to customers of this loan product.

rate.description: The percent default rate for this interest policy (i.e. 3.2 means a 3.2% rate). This default rate can be overridden on a per-account basis if a `rate` is selected at the time of assigning an account to a product. Rates for an account can also be updated post-account creation.

credit_limit_cents.description: The default maximum principal credit (in cents) available for a customer account. This default limit can be overridden on a per-account basis if a `credit_limit` is selected at the time of assigning an account to a product. Credit limits for an account can also be updated post-account creation.

offer.description: For installment loans, the offer applied to this account. This field is not necessary for credit products.
